To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MatHold _mathold;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_mathold = MatHold(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_mathold.IsReady)
{
    var period = _mathold.Period.Value;
    var current = _mathold.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.mathold = self.MatHold(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.mathold.IsReady:
    period = self.mathold.Period.Value
    current = self.mathold.Current.Value
